Duke University June 7 at 8:33 AM  ·  "This extraordinary gift from Duke Endowment advances our university’s position as a destination for exceptional faculty ... These scholars will accelerate discovery and collaborative research across our campus and around the world.” — President Price The Duke Endowment of Charlotte, N.C., is supporting Duke University’s efforts to expand its faculty in computation, materials science and the resilience of the body and brain by completing the second phase of a $100 million investment. Duke University June 4 at 2:24 PM  ·  Jon Scheyer was formally announced as  Duke Men's Basketball 's next head coach in a press conference at Cameron Indoor Stadium this morning. Scheyer will take over the reins in April 2022, following Coach K's retirement. DURHAM – Duke University formally announced Jon Scheyer as the next head coach of the men's basketball program in a press conference in historic Cameron Indoor Stadium Friday morning. Scheyer will take over the reins of the iconic program in April of 2022. goduke.com Jon Scheyer Introduced as Next Head Coach - Duke University DURHAM – Duke University formally announced Jon Scheyer as the next head coach of the men's basketball program in a press conference in historic Cameron Indoor Stadium Friday morning. Duke University June 4 at 7:50 AM  ·  Extra good news this Friday — Not only is  Duke Lemur Center  reopening today for prepaid tours, but the DLC has also recently welcomed five new baby lemurs  🎉  Meet Coconut Palm, Clancy, Atticus, Malala, and Scout  🤩 +2 Duke University June 3 at 9:48 AM  ·  Happy 82nd anniversary to  Duke Engineering   🔬 🧬 ⚙️ 🚀 🔎  Since its formation, Pratt has grown into one of the nation’s fastest-rising engineering programs with nearly 3,000 faculty, staff and students, 15,000 accomplished alumni, and a record of trailblazing achievements Duke University June 2 at 5:20 PM  ·  In 46 years as a head coach at Army West Point and Duke, Coach K has amassed an NCAA-record 1,170 victories. In 41 seasons in Durham, he has led  Duke Men's Basketball  to five NCAA national championships and 12 Final Fours. Jon Scheyer has been named Coach K's successor and will be the program's 20th head coach beginning in 2022-23. DURHAM – Duke men's basketball head coach Mike Krzyzewski, who has won more Division I men's college basketball games than any coach in history, announced Wednesday that the 2021-22 season will be his final year of coaching. goduke.com Krzyzewski Announces 2021-22 as Final Season; Scheyer Named Next Head Coach - Duke University DURHAM – Duke men's basketball head coach Mike Krzyzewski, who has won more Division I men's college basketball games than any coach in history, announced Wednesday that the 2021-22 season will be his final year of coaching. Duke University June 2 at 4:01 PM  ·  The winningest coach in Division I men’s basketball history will retire after the 2021-22 season — Thank you, Coach K  💙 Duke University June 2 at 9:09 AM  ·  Can’t imagine campus without  Duke University Chapel   🤩  Formally dedicated on this day in 1935, the Chapel’s iconic design was the work of prominent African American architect Julian Abele Duke University June 1 at 8:12 AM  ·  Sarah P. Duke Gardens  has officially reopened to the public  🌷   🔗   https://gardens.duke.edu/phase2 Duke University May 31 at 6:06 AM  ·  On this Memorial Day, we honor those who gave their lives in service to our country.  The university and  Duke Alumni  maintain a memorial on campus to recognize and remember Duke alumni who died while on active duty in the United States military. Located between Duke Chapel and Duke Divinity School, the memorial was first dedicated in 1993 to honor the sacrifice of Duke’s 236 World War II dead. In 2009, the names of 54 men and women who gave their lives on active duty since World War II were added to the existing wall.
